DOC.brief_title: Evaluation A Morning Dosing Of A New Medicine And Its Effects On Sleep At Bedtime In Subjects With Primary Insomnia
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Difficulty go sleep and/or stay asleep least past 3 month . Insomnia must result significant distress impairment function home , socially work . Otherwise good health significant unstable medical disorder include psychiatric , neurological , endocrine , heart , lung gastrointestinal disorder , drug/alcohol abuse , cognitive impairment , cancer chronic pain condition arthritis . Exclusion criterion : History sleep disorder sleep apnea restless leg syndrome ; regular sleep habit , include bedtime 9 PM midnight , nightshift/rotating shift work , frequent napping plan travel across > 2 time zone .
